_json.gridTitle: How To Build A Sobriety Toolbox. (+ 27 Tools.) — HIP SOBRIETY
_json.description: One of my favorite and more EXHAUSTIVE posts - How To Build A Sobriety  Toolbox, aka, a healthy coping mechanism toolbox, replete with 27  tools. Or, as I would call it if headlines didn't matter, "How To MacGyver  Being Human".  It is filled with some of my favorite things, and as one of my friends  texted me, some very disturbing things (ASMR is apparently not for  everyone).   Having an arsenal of tools and understanding how to use them is a vitally  important part of recovery and also, an...
